questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment
upload the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing report
connect the equipment to the mains and check whether the equipment is getting ON
check whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230

videos.src: assets/videos/BIMIQUECOP/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALLOUTLET VOLTAGE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALLOUTLET VOLTAGE

questions.question: shift the equipment to another place where wall outlet is provided with 230 AC Voltage
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether the power cord is defective

videos.src: assets/videos/BIMIQUECOP/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE CONTINUITY OF POWER CORD.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE CONTINUITY OF POWER CORD

questions.question: replace the power cord with a new one
check and confirm for any breakage / carbon formation of Input power connector
replace or clean the Input power connector accordingly
check whether the fuse is blown out and confirm whether it is defective
replace the fuse with new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check and confirm whether the voltage is available the ON / OFF switch
replace the switch with a new one
check and confirm whether the transformer output voltage is available
replace the transformer with a new one
check and confirm whether the intensity of lamp cannot be changed
open the equipment as shown in the video, replace the potentiometer with a new one
check and confirm whether the observation image is unclear.
clean the eyepiece, condenser, specimen glasses thoroughly with soft tissue and alcohol
check and confirm whether uneven brightness appears in the observation field
place the objective properly and confirm whether the issue still persists.
raise the condenser upward to achieve more light and confirm whether the issue still persists.
clean the objective, eyepiece, condenser and window lens with soft tissue and alcoho
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call
Thanks
